rooms.description: Spacious living area with Scandinavian style minimalism and large windows ensuring ample natural light.
Modern open kitchen integrated with dining space following minimalistic Scandinavian design principles and Vastu guidelines emphasizing the east for cooking area.
Master bedroom positioned in the northeast quadrant according to Vastu, with a private balcony and ample natural lighting.
Guest bedroom placed in the northwest region for balance as per Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom adhering to Scandinavian design aesthetics with minimal decor and functional space.
Additional bedroom with light color palettes complementing the overall minimalist style.

Home theater room designed in a Scandinavian aesthetic with acoustic panels and built-in seating for entertainment purposes. The placement respects Vastu guidelines by avoiding direct alignment with the main entrance.
Small study or office area featuring functional furniture and ample lighting.
